body:
Hello!
Just thought I should make this. It's me Lions, CaptainLiontari, Liyon, LLLLLION, etc.
I retired from mod a few months ago. Decided to come back, but during the time I was retired I started using a different account - dicip.
And from there it became my main account for other servers and such, so yeah, I've come back as mod on this account.

EDIT: It's not an AMA, I'm just letting people know that I am lions.
body_tagged:

title: dicip - Lion (CaptainLiontari)

replies.body: What made you to decide to retire twice and return as mod as twice?
replies.body_tagged: What made you to decide to retire twice and return as mod as twice?

replies.body: Well the first time I came back the au time zone needed the help, plus I wanted to be mod again. <br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null">This time I'm on summer break in a week, plus I wanted to be mod again.
